name: Twilio Click To Call: Flask
description: An example of implementing click to call functionality in a Python Flask application

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: Your Twilio account's unique identifier, found here: https://www.twilio.com/user/account

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Your Twilio account's secret key, found here: https://www.twilio.com/user/account

TWILIO_PHONE.description: A Twilio number assigned to your account in E.164 format, found here: https://www.twilio.com/user/account/phone-numbers/incoming
